summary: Dependency vulnerability in got 12.0.3 package (CVE-2022-33987) allowing redirect to UNIX socket. This medium severity issue was automatically resolved by removing the vulnerable library from the project inventory.
userImpact: Users could be vulnerable to attacks exploiting the redirect behavior in the got HTTP library if they depend on affected versions of the testing package.
rootCause: The got package before version 12.1.0 (or 11.8.5) allows HTTP redirects to UNIX sockets, potentially enabling exploitation.
proposedFix: Upgrade got library to version 12.1.0 or 11.8.5 or later
resolutionDetails: Automatically closed by Mend as the vulnerable library was removed from the project dependency inventory or marked as ignored
keyQuote: The got package before 12.1.0 (also fixed in 11.8.5) for Node.js allows a redirect to a UNIX socket.
